str2: In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Passive - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: From dikaios; to render just or innocent.
That, that one there, yonder. From ekei; that one (neuter) thing); often intensified by the article prefixed.
From chairo; graciousness, of manner or act.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Passive - 1st Person Plural
str2: A prolongation and middle voice form of a primary verb; to cause to be, i.e. to become, used with great latitude.
From kleros and the base of nomos (reflexively) getting by apportionment); a sharer by lot, i.e. Inheritor; by implication, a possessor.
A primary particle; down, in varied relations (genitive, dative or accusative) with which it is joined).
Hope, expectation, trust, confidence. From a primary elpo; expectation or confidence.
Life, both of physical (present) and of spiritual (particularly future) existence. From zao; life.
